name: Zen Tank TDS
description:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Zen Tank TDS is a Tower Defense Game with Tanks!

Build your army of Tanks to defend the destination from invaders!

Face off against MULTIPLE ENEMY VARIANTS!

Upgrade your Tanks and have double turrets or laser-shooting atrocities! (or just stick to the peasant turret, your choice)

Learn the ropes and challenge yourself in the HARDCORE difficulty!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

With its deep roots in Newgrounds, some features are available ONLY on Newgrounds!

NEWGROUNDS LINK

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Downloadable coming soon!
